Name: getzlab/AnnoMate
Description: Review anything (purities, mutations, etc) within a jupyter notebook with plotly dash and jupyter widgets

Name: CNVPlotComponent
Description:
CNVPlotComponent.py module

Interactive CNV Plot with mutation multiplicity scatterplot

Mutation scatter interactive with mutation table

Name: DataTableComponents
Description: DataTableComponents module contains methods to generate components for displaying table information

Name: MutationTableComponent
Description:
MutationTableComponent.py module

Interactive Mutation Table with column selection, sorting, selecting, and filtering

Name: PhylogicComponents
Description:
PhylogicComponents.py module

Phylogic CCF Plot and Trees implemented in the PatientReviewer and PhylogicReviewer

Phylogic PMF Plot implemented in the PhylogicReviewer

Name: ExampleReviewer
Description:
Example Reviewer Description
A basic reviewer for the AnnoMate tutorial.
Uses simulated data from simulated_data directory

Name: getzlab/PurityReviewer
Description: Suite of purity reviewers and review components

Name: AbsoluteCustomSolutionComponent
Description: Displays a allelic copy ratio profile with the option to set the 0 and 1 line (via slider or input value) corresponding to an integer assignment to copy number peaks. Automatically calculates the purity given the corresponding solution.

Name: AbsoluteSolutionsReportComponent
Description: Displays a allelic copy ratio profile and a table of solutions from ABSOLUTE (Carter, 2014). The rows of the table can be selected, and the copy number profile plot will be updated with the corresponding ABSOLUTE "comb" solution.

Name: ManualPurityReviewer
Description: A reviewer dashboard that displays generic sample data and a allelic copy ratio profile for a given sample. The allelic copy ratio profile includes sliders and inputs to manually set the 0 and 1 line corresponding to the integer assignment of the genomic segments and automatically calculates a purity.

Name: MatchedPurityReviewer
Description: A reviewer dashboard that displays generic sample data and a allelic copy ratio profile for a given sample. The allelic copy ratio profile is linked to a table with the solutions from ABSOLUTE (Carter, 2014), where you can select a row and the corresponding ABSOLUTE "comb" solution will be plotted over the allelic copy ratio plot.

Name: getzlab/PatientReviewer
Description: Explore integrated data on the patient level interactively in a Dash App, powered by JupyterReviewer

Name: PatientReviewer
Description:
PatientReviewer.py module

Interactive dashboard for reviewing and annotating data on a patient-by-patient basis
Includes app layout and callback functionality

Run by the user with a Jupyter Notebook: UserPatientReviewer.ipynb

Name: BamTableComponent
Description: Table of bam files. Each row corresponds to a different bam file, and includes a custom field to reference by sample/patient or other feature. Rows are selectable.

Name: IGVJSComponent
Description: Displays an internal IGV session inside the dashboard. Takes a list of bams to load and a genomic coordinate to go to.

Name: IGVLocalComponent
Description: Connects with the local IGV app, outside of the dashboard. Takes a list of bams to load and a genomic coordinate to go to.

Name: MutationTableComponent
Description: Table of mutations. Mutations can be grouped by different features, and all mutations that are within a group are displayed (ie by patient (tumors and normal) or exclusively by sample).

Name: DeprecatedMutationReviewer
Description: Deprecated reviewer. Please see GeneralMutationReviewer.

Name: GeneralMutationReviewer
Description: A general reviewer for reviewing mutations with IGV. Includes default annotations corresponding to Barnell, 2019 Standard operating procedure for reviewing mutations. Iterates through mutations and automatically loads bams and goes to corresponding coordinates for the mutation in IGV (either local or inside the dashboard itself).

Name: getzlab/PhylogicReviewer
Description: Interactive app to review Phylogic solutions and data.
